channel.title: Teleport Coordinations[PI] Rep++
channel.description:
Okay, so in my Duel Arena, it's kind of messed up. Like if your in some other place completely unrelated to the Duel Arena it will say, "You can not teleport while in a Duel!" And yes I do know how to fix this, but what I don't understand is this code.
[b]if ((absX >= 3331 && absX <= 3359 && absY >= 3243 && absY <= 3259)) {[/b]
Could you explain it to me? Thanks!

item.title: Teleport Coordinations[PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:1, topic:415102”]Okay, so in my Duel Arena, it’s kind of messed up. Like if your in some other place completely unrelated to the Duel Arena it will say, “You can not teleport while in a Duel!” And yes I do know how to fix this, but what I don’t understand is this code.

[b]if ((absX >= 3331 && absX <= 3359 && absY >= 3243 && absY <= 3259)) {[/b]

Could you explain it to me? Thanks![/quote]

It’s saying if the players location x value is greater then 3331, or less than 3359 and if the players y coordinate value is greater then 3243, and less than 3259. Do whatever follows the statement.

Read full topic
